label: 六議
説明文: A term in Heian criminal law referring to six groups in the population with specific qualifications(yūshikakusha):  those closely related to the tennō (gishin) , those with long service careers (giko) , those respected for their wisdom (giken) , those respected for their intellectual skills (ginō) , those who had achieved a certain level of success (gikō, and those who are third rank or higher (giki) . [有資格者、議親、議故、議賢、議能、議功、議貴]
